briefTitle: Patterns of Prescribing and Monitoring of Palbociclib
officialTitle: Patterns of Prescribing and Monitoring of Palbociclib
conditions: Metastatic Breast Cancer, Advanced Breast Cancer, Estrogen Receptor-positive Breast Cancer, Human Epidermal Growth Factor 2 Negative Carcinoma of Breast
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Palbociclib dose according to the package insert recommendations.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women at least 18 years old
* ER+, HER2- advanced breast cancer
* receiving palbociclib

Exclusion Criteria:

* brain metastases
* on palbociclib clinical trial
